productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Formulated with ceramides, it helps strengthen, hydrate, and protect skin so you can achieve smooth, bouncy skin. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wonder Ceramide Mocchi Toner A multi-use, value-sized toner that works wonders? Meet our Wonder Ceramide Mocchi Toner, a hydrating, skin-repairing toner that nourishes weak, dry skin with a hydrating viscous texture so skin looks and feels stronger and healthier. Formulated with ceramides that help reinforce skin’s moisture barrier and EWG Green ingredients, our gentle, hypoallergenic toner provides daily care that helps strengthen, hydrate, and protect skin so you can achieve smooth, bouncy, mocchi-like skin!

4 Ways To Use Cotton Pad Soak a cotton pad thoroughly and sweep over face to hydrate and condition the skin. 7 Skin Method Boost skin's hydration by patting toner into the skin 7 times. Sheet Mask Soak a dry sheet mask or several cotton pads in toner and leave on skin for 10 minutes for an intensely hydrating treatment. Mist Dispense toner in empty mist bottle to refresh skin throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toner on the market!
reviews.reviewText: Not only does this smell amazing, but it’ll make your skin FEEL amazing. I’m on my second bottle and it’s become my holy grail. Skin feels moisturized and glows after incorporating this into my routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice toner
reviews.reviewText: Lovely slippery texture. A little thicker than water, but not as thick as some essences. It does have a pretty noticeable citrus scent, but I really like it and it fades as it dries; I usually avoid fragranced skincare due to a sensitive nose rather than sensitive skin. Dries down non-sticky and makes my oily skin look a little glowy, but not shiny or greasy. Feels mildly soothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible, my holy grail
reviews.reviewText: I have combination skin that can get extremely oily thanks to my skin overproducing oil to try to fix the dehydration. But I also get extreme dry patches, especially in winter but also in summertime too. Unfortunately I'm also very acne prone, so I have to use salicylic acid cleansers to deal with that which makes the dehydration worse. My skin is also quite sensitive. I've tried different moisturizers, but I have to use oil-free moisturizers thanks to my acne, and none of the ones I tried were occlusive enough to cure my dry spots.So I thought "maybe a toner will help" since that should be lightweight enough for my skin. I was really skeptical that just adding a toner would fix the problem, but I did my research. I found out that Korean beauty products are some of the best for sensitive, dry skin, and then I found out about Tony Moly toners on a forum. I was so surprised at how much of a value this was, even tho it's more money to spend up front.I couldn't be happier!! My skin is so soft and this doesn't break me out. It has a light, natural citrusy smell, but it doesn't irritate my skin at all. My dry patches are COMPLETELY gone, and my skin isn't overly oily anymore since it's no longer dehydrated. I currently only use one layer of this at night since it's summer and I don't need a lot of extra help right now. But I'm sure a couple of layers morning and night - paired with extra moisturizer - will work just fine in winter!Please do yourself a favor and try this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gives a nice finish
reviews.reviewText: This toner gives an immediate nice finish to the skin but would I repurchase? No. I think there are far more superior toners on the market worth the money. This provides a temporary gloss to the skin (like any hydrating toner would tbh) but aside from that, I don’t believe it does anything more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it now
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the amount you get. It makes my skin barrier healthy and strong. Moisturizing and plumping. Will work for sensitive skin too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: HYDRATION is key! I bought this toner because I felt that I had a damaged skin barrier and wanted to restore my skin. I have oily dehydrated skin at the moment, and no amount of moisturizer will keep my oils at bay. I was looking for a hydrating toner that contained Ceramides or Panthenol. This toner not only checked those boxes but also contains Hyaluronic acid (hydration) and Centella Asiatica (soothing effect)! I also like how the ingredient list is not excessively long compared to other formulas.I have some rosacea spots on my skin and this toner did not sting my cheeks at all, but left my skin plump and hydrated! When I moved my facial muscles, I used to feel a tightness in my skin despite my skin being oily. After using this toner, I no longer feel the tightness in my skin and see less oil production. (I've also been using Krave Beauty products with this, just FYI.) I use the toner in the AM and PM and put 3-4 layers of the toner each time to rescue my skin barrier.Knowing TonyMoly's brand for a few years now, its cute packaging made me skeptical that this toner would do "wonders". Yet lo and behold, I can see this toner being a staple for a while. I live in a desert area near the beach, and this toner has provided me with great hydration. I also see this toner being effective in the winter months when my skin gets even drier. Also, the price point for 500 mL is such a great steal in my opinion!There is a slight scent, but I really enjoy the fresh, citrus/lemon scent and the smell dissipates quickly. I usually avoid heavily fragranced products, but I had no problems with the scent of this toner. The toner is milky and viscous, but the formula is runny like a liquid and adds to the hydration component this toner offers. Since I currently apply 3-4 layers of this toner at a time due to my damaged skin barrier, I can't say that this toner will sink into your skin immediately after one layer. However, it has helped all my other skincare products absorb better.When I initially bought it off Amazon, I was skeptical that this toner was not really from TonyMoly. Being the excessive person that I am, I bought this same toner from the official TonyMoly USA site and it's the same packaging as the Amazon one. (Too lazy to post pictures). Take it or leave it, this product is authentic folks!9/10 recommend this toner if you are looking for hydration with some great ingredients and affordable price point! I think I love the fact that I happened to stumble upon this toner and was surprised by how great it is. I like it so much I secretly don't want other people to know about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick consistency. Very moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Leaves skin supple and hydrated. Use as my first step after cleansing. Similar to Rhodes glazing milk.
I live this toner and wish I could find it again on this site. It does wonder to my face

Yo tengo piel mixta, la zona T es grasa t el área de la nariz tenía muchos puntos negros, este tónico me ha ayudado a disminuir visiblemente los poros abiertos y con ello los puntos negros.Amo que me deja la piel súper hidratada y preparada para aplicar el resto de mi skin care, sin duda lo recomiendo

It's not a one product wonder, so won't work any miracle on its own. I usually apply after washing my face and follow it up with serum and moisturizer. Reduces the stretchy feeling after washing and over a period of time skin feels supple and even toned. Suits my skin very well. The scent is mild and quantity is good for the price. Overall, I am happy with the outcome.
I like its texture and value for money. However, northing really special hence 4stars.

Buen tamaño y con olor agradable. Hidrata, limpia y deja la piel con una buena sensación. Yo creo que me durara mas de 3 meses utilizándolo día y noche. Es una buena opción para añadir a tu rutina de skin care. 😊
